title: Banisher of the Radiance

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, visit a player. They are now unaffected by your attribute. If you have already visited them before, they are now affected by your attribute again.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:

- While you are alive, all players lose the following immunities: Detection Immunity, Roleblock Immunity, Control Immunity, Redirect Immunity, and Death Immunity. Additionally, all visits that would be Astral are no longer Astral.
